```{r setup}
library(vchartr)
library(dplyr)
```


## Line Chart

```{r}
co2_emissions %>% 
  filter(country %in% c("China", "United States", "India")) %>% 
  vchart() %>% 
  v_line(
    aes(year, co2, color = country),
    lineLabel = list(visible = TRUE)
  ) %>% 
  v_specs(padding = list(right = 60)) %>% 
  v_specs_legend(visible = FALSE) %>% 
  v_scale_y_continuous(name = "measured in million tonnes", labels = ",") %>% 
  v_labs(
    title = "Annual CO₂ emissions",
    subtitle = "Source: Our World In Data"
  )
```


## Line and area range

```{r}
vchart(temperatures, aes(date)) %>% 
  v_area(
    aes(ymin = low, ymax = high),
    area_style = list(fill = "#848585", fill_opacity = 0.3)
  ) %>% 
  v_line(
    aes(y = `2024`), 
    line_style = list(stroke = "firebrick")
  ) %>%
  v_scale_x_date(date_breaks = "3 months", date_labels = "MMM") %>% 
  v_scale_y_continuous(
    name = "Temperature in degree celsius",
    labels = format_num_d3(".3r", suffix = "°C")
  ) %>% 
  v_labs(
    title = "Temperatures in France between 2019 and 2023 compared to 2024",
    subtitle = "Source: Enedis"
  )
```
